plot: Moscow, ca 1950. A simple provincial girl, trapped in a miserable marriage with a sophisticated muscovite, finds hope and redemption in her mother's love.
plot_en: Moscow, ca 1950. A simple provincial girl, trapped in a miserable marriage with a sophisticated muscovite, finds hope and redemption in her mother's love.
plot_es: Moscow, ca 1950. A simple provincial girl, trapped in a miserable marriage with a sophisticated muscovite, finds hope and redemption in her mother's love.
title: I vse-taki ya lyublyu...
